hero.description: Creating opportunities for individuals to use web3 technology. We connect people to web3—through entertainment, blockchain development, business development, and community events.

bridgeAndEcosystem.title: Bridge & Ecosystem
bridgeAndEcosystem.description: Astar zkEVM is an Ethereum Layer-2 scaling solution that leverages Polygon's CDK and AggLayer technology. Astar zkEVM inherits Ethereum's security while maintaining EVM equivalence.

yokiOrigins.title: Yoki Origins
yokiOrigins.description: Yoki Origins is a journey to discover original Yoki characters inspired by supernatural creatures from Japan. Collect and upgrade your Yoki in this exciting and friendly web3 experience for everyone.

solutions.title: Our Solutions
solutions.description: There’s a solution for everyone with Astar. Companies, developers, and individuals are connecting to web3.

startale.name: Startale Labs
startale.description: Startale Labs is dedicated to accelerating the mass adoption of Web3, developing Japan's largest public blockchain, Astar Network, and providing Web3 infrastructure through the Startale Web3 Cloud.

sony.name: Sony Network Communications
sony.description: Sony Network Communications and Startale Labs are thrilled to announce that they have entered into a joint venture agreement dedicated to developing a blockchain that can become the backbone of global web3 infrastructure.

bobg.name: BOBG
bobg.description: BOBG is a company that provides comprehensive services to Japanese blockchain businesses, ranging from token issuance, operation, and management to cryptocurrency listing.

uobAndSamsung.name: UOB Venture Management and Samsung Next
uobAndSamsung.description: Startale Labs secured a total of $3.5m in funding from UOB Venture Management, a wholly-owned subsidiary of one of Singapore's top three banks, United Overseas Bank, and Samsung Next, the CVC arm of Samsung.

japanLab.name: Astar Japan Lab
japanLab.description: Astar Japan Lab fuels the growth of Japanese services and businesses by conducting research and development, gathering knowledge, and collaborating with exciting and established companies.

shibuyaCity.name: Shibuya City
shibuyaCity.description: Astar is now partnering with the Shibuya to support the ward’s web3 initiatives. Shibuya prides itself on being the modern city of Tokyo. A hot spot for young entrepreneurs, high fashion, and miles of shopping outlets all centred around the Shibuya station.

deloitteTohmatsu.name: Deloitte Tohmatsu
deloitteTohmatsu.description: Deloitte Tohmatsu Group transforms the sports industry with Astar zkEVM

developer.title: Developer
developer.description: As Astar 2.0 evolves, so does our tech. We are excited to offer our bleeding-edge, cross-layer tech stack that will allow developers to benefit from multiple VMs, layers and consensus protocols.

substrate.description: Astar Substrate is the backend technology powering Polkadot’s leading parachain. Unlock access to build across virtual machines seamlessly and tap into interoperability with Polkadot SDK, substrate-based protocols. Ink! and Rust smart contracts ensure safety and our innovative reward mechanism powers unstoppable public goods.

features.multiVmSupport: Multi VM Support: EVM and WASM
features.interoperabilityAndComposability: Interoperability and Composability with Substrate chains
features.dappStakingRewards: dApp staking rewards providing builder income

zkevm.description: Astar zkEVM is the perfect solution for enterprises looking to leverage the security and network effects of Ethereum without sacrificing the user experience. Powered by cutting-edge zero knowledge technology, Astar zkEVM empowers businesses to embrace web3 at scale while offering developers a familiar environment with proven tooling.

features.lowFees: Low fees even during high demand
features.access: Access to a vibrant web3 ecosystem
features.developerExperience: Familiar developer experience powered by Ethereum’s proven stack of tooling and infrastructure

globalHackathons.title: Global Hackathons
globalHackathons.description: A collection of funding to connect you to web3.

dAppStaking.title: dApp Staking
dAppStaking.description: An incentivized program to connect developers to the Astar community, where everyone is rewarded.

astrAndItsUtility.title: ASTR and its utility
astrAndItsUtility.description: ASTR is the native token driving Astar Network, having ultimate utility by serving various functions such as staking rewards, gas, and grants.

dAppStaking.title: dApp Staking
dAppStaking.description: dApp Staking is Astar’s unique mechanism to financially incentivise developers and is a crucial accelerator in realizing the Web3 vision, as it lays the foundation for the development of exceptional dApps for users and fuels the drive towards making Web3 accessible to all.

community.title: Community
community.description: Find your tribe and connect with with other Astar enthusiasts.
